definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
to be used up/to be exhausted

sentences.english: But the weak states remain vulnerable to a loss of confidence by depositors.
sentences.chinese: 一旦储户信心丧失，弱国仍将面临巨大风险。

sentences.english: The family home has been foreclosed.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子丧失了抵押赎回权。

sentences.english: But the Democrats have lost their sixtieth vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是，民主党人丧失了其第六十票。

sentences.english: If someone has been drinking heavily and loses consciousness, get emergency help.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人喝得烂醉丧失意识，你要马上对其施以帮助。

sentences.english: Nowadays in the USA, more and more young people are losing interest in politics.
sentences.chinese: 现在的美国，越来愈多的年轻人对政治丧失了兴趣。
难道一切都毫无疑问地丧失殆尽了吗？

sentences.english: Seen here in a portal tract is an intense chronic inflammatory infiltrate with loss of bile ductules.
sentences.chinese: 图中的门管区具有突出的慢性炎性浸润而胆小管丧失。

sentences.english: They are three times removed from the ideal forms of objects in reality.
sentences.chinese: 使现实的东西完全丧失了原本的完美造型。

sentences.english: They are deconsolidated from the date that control ceases.
sentences.chinese: 从丧失实际控制权之日起停止合并。

sentences.english: Have you ever been unconscious from an injury?
sentences.chinese: 你有过外伤所致的意识丧失吗？

sentences.english: Some people have sacrificed principle and sought profits at the expense of public interests. They have crossed the moral baseline.
sentences.chinese: 一些人见利忘义，损害公众利益，丧失了道德底线。

sentences.english: These people have forfeited the right to live in society.
sentences.chinese: 这些人已丧失了在社会上生活的权利。

sentences.english: Not all men lose the desire for sex when their testosterone levels drop -- but many do.
sentences.chinese: 部分而非所有的男性都会丧失对性的欲望。

sentences.english: I regret to tell you that very many Americans lives have been lost.
sentences.chinese: 我沈痛地告诉各位，很多美国人丧失了生命。

sentences.english: If the mother delays, she may lose her chance to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 如果耽误时间，她可能就会丧失睡觉的机会。

sentences.english: A material's loss of malleability due to chemical treatment or physical change.
sentences.chinese: 材料由于化学处理或物理变化丧失了柔韧性。

definition: to be used up/to be exhausted
to deprive/to expropriate/to strip (sb of his property)
to obliterate completely/to vanish from the face of the earth
to sink down to/to be reduced to (sth inferior)
to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
